_sText:
surf_skybears_lighted

Link to the normal version of surf_skybears. Be carefull !! This map is made for normal surf servers + RPG. Certainly NOT for DM. This is without HDR but lighted, the hdr version was around 40MB Noblock required ! Fixed or changed things
  • Added light, but not hdr <.<
  • I made the rounds 1 min shorter
  • The knife round won't fail with a rpg mod now
Gameplay: Ct's and t's spawn at each side of spawn without any weapons: There are 3 ways to surf: At the noob way, there's a cannon: You just need to walk in the loop and it fires you! Can't be easier^^ When you are shot, you get a knife. Now we have the Pro way, it's hard to surf but fast. The extreme way are 3 stages + bonus This version is much darker in the extreme way! After 5 minutes, everyone in here will be teleported to jail and the jail teleport will be disabled. And when you teleport, you get one of these weapons: stage 1 - Knife stage 2 - deagle stage 3 - shotgun stage 4 - m4a1 Stage 1 Stage 2 Stage 3 (The bonus is rather fun to surf) There's also a small secret at the end of the bonus. And in that secret you can set the next round to 'knives only'! I made a tutorial about this: TUTORIAL WARNING:It will fail if there's a DM mod installed on the server Please enjoy!
Credits: Made by: Mapper And is made possible by the ENi-community and Mirror Map Studios.(especially AmstaFF) I also credit Fpsbanana for some prefabs. The letters -> !Black The waterfall -> kEn_sct The moving cannon -> Alec The watertunnel -> Mr.White Next round knife -> Roosta, Teeth Some ramps -> ryan sterner
I made a demo with windows media player, there are some difficulties, i will maybe add this later.
